text: قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ قَالُواْ يَٰحَسۡرَتَنَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطۡنَا فِيهَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡمِلُونَ أَوۡزَارَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِمۡۚ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ

translation.en: Those will have lost who deny the meeting with Allah, until when the Hour [of resurrection] comes upon them unexpectedly, they will say, "Oh, [how great is] our regret over what we neglected concerning it," while they bear their burdens on their backs. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear
translation.id: Sungguh rugi orang-orang yang mendustakan pertemuan dengan Allah; sehingga apabila Kiamat datang kepada mereka secara tiba-tiba, mereka berkata, "Alangkah besarnya penyesalan kami terhadap kelalaian kami tentang Kiamat itu," sambil mereka memikul dosa-dosa di atas punggungnya. Alangkah buruknya apa yang mereka pikul
